parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

paymentTypeName.description: The name that is displayed for the paymentType

propertyName.description: The name that is displayed for the property

paymentMethod.description: The type of method used for the payment

chargeSchedulePaymentValue.description: The amount of the scheduled charge

propertyId.description: The identifier of the property, being an instances of a property class, e.g. Interest is property class and Debit Interest is property

propertyClassId.description: The identifier of the property class

arrangementId.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

maturityDate.description: The delivery period or maturity date of the contract transacted

coolingOffDate.description: The period of time available for a client where they can cancel an agreement without penalty

term.description: The period to which the rate applies

termAmount.description: The amount of an arrangement agreement that forms the basis of the agreement (e.g. the amont to be lent)

accruedInterest.description: The amount of interest that has been accrued

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

propertyName.description: The name that is displayed for the property
The name that is displayed for the property

chargeAmount.description: Holds the charge amount equivalent in charge account currency
